full_summary:
### Tender Notice Cancellation: EZ899-231082/A

### Publication Information
Tender notice EZ899-231082/A has been cancelled. Details of the original tender notice are provided for information purposes only.

* **Solicitation Number**: EZ899-231082/A
* **Publication Date**: September 15, 2022
* **Cancellation Date**: October 11, 2022

### Service Category
The cancelled tender notice pertained to the construction industry, specifically in the areas of:

* **Bridges, Elevated Highways, Tunnels, Subways and Railroads**
* **Structural Steel Work**

### Regional Requirements
The procurement was to take place in:

* **British Columbia**, Canada

### Government Entity and End-User Entity
* **Public Works and Government Services Canada** (PWGSC) was the contracting authority.
* **Public Works and Government Services Canada** (PWGSC) would be the end-user entity.

### Contact Information
* **Jan Leung**, Senior Contract Specialist (Procurement)
* **Email:** [janie.leung@pwgsc-tpsgc.gc.ca](mailto:janie.leung@pwgsc-tpsgc.gc.ca)
* **Phone:** (778) 919-3273
* **Address:** 800 Burrard Street, Room 219, Vancouver, British Columbia, V6Z 0B9, Canada

### Trade Agreements
The tender notice was subject to the following trade agreements:

* **Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)**

### Additional Notes
Please note that the original tender notice has been cancelled, and no further information will be provided. The above details are provided as a record of the cancelled tender notice. [TOC]
